name: Project Astro (Discontinued)
description:
This game is UNFINISHED, it probally has like 5 billion bugs. 

WASD to move
SPACE to jump
Left Click to shoot
R to reload 
Right Click to dash
TAB to restart scene

Hold Shift to heal, you need 3 of the little white things that enemies drop on death (ui is on the minimap for some reason)

SCROLL to change weapons

The shotgun is by far the best weapon, the charge rifle doesn't really work but the grenade launcher is ok. 

There are 4 areas, dying or hitting the spikes will restart the room, you have a ton of HP for testing purposes, so the only way you can really die is by hitting the spikes. 

The final boss is by far the best part of the game

I'm just releasing this so I have something to show for like 6 months of work, the game is discontinued, and will not ever be updated. 

Thank you for playing!

Also its only on windows, sorry
